entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
